cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Discard 1 random card from your opponentâ€™s Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Discard 1 card then Shuffle 1 Equipment on the Field into the Deck.
[ACTIVATED] Discard any number of Equipment cards of the same element then Deal damage to a Champion equal to the number of Equipment discarded X 10.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 10 damage to a Champion or if that Champion was healed during your opponents last turn: Deal 30 damage instead.
[ACTIVATED] If an Equipment equipped to your Champion was destroyed during your opponents last turn: Add that Equipment from your Grave to your Hand.
